amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for capital and debt service grants to the National Railroad Passenger Corporation for capital investments by $1,203,500,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 20 printed in part A of House Report 111-578 to reduce funding for Capital and Debt Service Grants to the National Railroad Passenger Corporation for capital investments by $1,203,500,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 129 - 293 (Roll no. 494).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 129 - 293 (Roll no. 494).
